citation: Proclamation under the Electricity Supply Industry Amendment Act 2003 (Tas)
text:
Proclamation under the Electricity Supply Industry Amendment Act 2003

I, the Governor in and over the State of Tasmania and its Dependencies in the Commonwealth of Australia, acting with the advice of the Executive Council, by this my proclamation made under section 2 of the Electricity Supply Industry Amendment Act 2003 fix the day on which the Electricity - National Scheme (Tasmania) Act 1999 commences as the day on which Part 3 and sections 33, 35, 36 and 37 of the Electricity Supply Industry Amendment Act 2003 commence.

12 May 2005

W. J. E. COX

Governor

By His Excellency's Command,

P. A. LENNON

Treasurer

Displayed and numbered in accordance with the Rules Publication Act 1953.

Notified in the Gazette on 18 May 2005

This proclamation is administered in the Department of Treasury and Finance.
